name: Commando 3D Assassin - Special Ops Sniper Strike
name_original: Commando 3D Assassin - Special Ops Sniper Strike
description:
Step into the world of modern day black ops combat against the forces of terrorism in this epic free roam FPS shooter for mobile and tablet devices. Upgrade your arsenal, equip powerful weapons and venture into the most infamous battlefields in modern era to test your individual and team shooting skills.

Step into the world of specialized black ops FPS shooting, ranging your weapons for ultimate test on uncharted territories. Shoot your way out of lethal situations and accomplish missions to reclaim lost army bases.

HIGH POWERED WEAPONS

Take to the battlefield weapons of mass destruction:
::: MP5 :::
::: M4 :::
::: AK47 ::::
::: SHOTGUN :::
::: SNIPER RIFLE :::

INTENSE CAMPAIGN MODE IN VARIOUS BATTLEFIELDS

Battle in over 100+ black ops missions spread in 4 detailed environments and battlefields filled with perils and dangers on every corner.

WIDELY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
Responsive and detailed free roam FPS controls designed for mobile devices deliver the best portable shooting experience

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

Over 100+ black ops missions to take part in
Travel through 4 large environments and enemy bases
Choose from multiple weapons and unlock more by completing missions and earning cash rewards
Highly responsive controls optimized for mobile devices
